channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [DERBY-3725] add more information to the XSDB1:ERROR XSDB1: Unknown page format at page error
item.description:
A likely cause of this error is some sort of page level corruption which has corrupted the format id field of the page itself. Some more information
about the data on the page may help diagnose what is going on - for instance a page dump may give some insight.

ERROR XSDB1: Unknown page format at page Page(122,Container(0, 1248))

item.summary: add more information to the XSDB1:ERROR XSDB1: Unknown page format at page error

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: fix has been applied to trunk, 10.4 branch and 10.3 branch.

Mike,

In which version its fixed, because i am getting the below same error in 10.5.3.0

Mike,

Below is the derby.log
